meanings.definition: The skull of a vertebrate, especially the part that encloses the brain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study craniums to understand the brain.
meanings.sent3: The craniums in the museum looked like puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts echoed within her craniums.
meanings.sent5: The craniums are like a fortress guarding the brain.

meanings.definition: The bony structure of the head, excluding the face.
meanings.sent1: He felt a bump on his craniums.
meanings.sent2: The craniums house the brain and provide protection.
meanings.sent4: His craniums held the weight of the world.
meanings.sent5: The craniums formed a sturdy shield around his head.
